name: Get Into UX (Notion Checklist)
description: Hey you, it’s Sofia and Kim here. We’re both Lead Designers at Google and Farfetch, and on a mission to help you get you into UX.INSIDE THE CHECKLISTWe know that the biggest challenge with getting into UX is feeling overwhelmed by all the resources out there. We're all about keeping things simple. This is an 8 step checklist to get you on the right track. Follow this and we promise you'll be get there. WHO MADE THESE GUIDES?Sofia - Design Lead @ GoogleSofia is a Lead Interaction Designer for Goo
